verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korea 's government] [V: says] [ARG1: it is considering calling off a planned nuclear summit between dictator Kim Jong - un and U.S. President Donald Trump] .
North Korea 's government says it [V: is] considering calling off a planned nuclear summit between dictator Kim Jong - un and U.S. President Donald Trump .
North Korea 's government says [ARG0: it] is [V: considering] [ARG1: calling off a planned nuclear summit between dictator Kim Jong - un and U.S. President Donald Trump] .
North Korea 's government says [ARG0: it] is considering [V: calling] off [ARG1: a planned nuclear summit between dictator Kim Jong - un and U.S. President Donald Trump] .
North Korea 's government says it is considering calling off a [V: planned] [ARG1: nuclear summit] between dictator Kim Jong - un and U.S. President Donald Trump .
